typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Balancer pool must have exactly 2 tokens."

arguments.value: Balancer pool must have exactly 2 tokens.

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Balancer pool must have exactly 2 tokens."

documentation.text:
@dev Fetches the fair LP token/ETH price from Balancer, with 18 decimals of precision.
 Source: https://github.com/AlphaFinanceLab/homora-v2/blob/master/contracts/oracle/BalancerPairOracle.sol

attributes.text:
@dev Fetches the fair LP token/ETH price from Balancer, with 18 decimals of precision.
 Source: https://github.com/AlphaFinanceLab/homora-v2/blob/master/contracts/oracle/BalancerPairOracle.sol

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Balancer pool must have exactly 2 tokens."

attributes.type: literal_string "Balancer pool must have exactly 2 tokens."
attributes.value: Balancer pool must have exactly 2 tokens.

devdoc.author: David Lucid <david@rari.capital> (https://github.com/davidlucid)
devdoc.details: Implements the `PriceOracle` interface used by Fuse pools (and Compound v2).

getUnderlyingPrice(address).details: Implements the PriceOracle interface for Fuse pools (and Compound v2).

params.cToken: The cToken address for price retrieval.

returns._0: Price denominated in ETH, with 18 decimals, for the given cToken address.

params.underlying: The underlying token address for which to get the price (set to zero address for ETH).

devdoc.title: BalancerLpTokenPriceOracle

getUnderlyingPrice(address).notice: Get the underlying price of a cToken.

price(address).notice: Get the LP token price price for an underlying token address.

userdoc.notice: BalancerLpTokenPriceOracle is a price oracle for Balancer LP tokens.
